Pre-Game Insights: Dodgers' manager Dave Roberts expressed optimism that Shohei Ohtani would be available for Game 3 of the World Series against the Yankees.
Ohtani was injured in Game 2 of the World Series and stayed in Los Angeles for an MRI, joining the team in New York for a workout.
